text: Bassin du Diable (Devil's Lake) is a lake in the city of Saint-Denis, Réunion, France. This lake is at an elevation of 500 m, from the river bed Grand Bras, a tributary of the Rivière Saint-Denis. This basin is associated with a legend told in the nineteenth century in the Album of the Reunion of '. Category:Lakes of Réunion Category:Réunion National Park
title: Bassin du Diable
